name: fault Series ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK vol 1
detailed_description:
Includes selected music from both fault - milestone one and milestone two side:above.

WARNING Due to copyright issues, not all of the tracks used in fault - milestone one and fault - milestone two side:above are included within this OST. Please reference the tracks list to verify which tracks are included within this product. Please note the music uses the mp3 and flac audio format.
